seo_content:
Exclusive AquaFunded Trading Offer

AquaFunded, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in December 2023, is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, 2 Steps and 3 Steps program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $200,000. Supported platforms include MetaTrader 5 (MT5), MetaTrader 4 (MT4), cTrader, Match investor and TradeLocker. Tradable instruments include Forex, indices, commodities and cryptocurrencies; leverage is stated as 1:100 for Forex, 1:20 for indices and commodities, and 1:2 for cryptocurrencies. confirmed by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: AquaFunded Promo Code: 45% Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with AquaFunded using our exclusive discount code. validated for the current trading season.
